title: Black Bristol pioneers honoured by Students' Union (University of Bristol)
text: ( Source : University of Bristol ) Two men who had a significant impact on the profile of black people in Bristol , the UK and beyond are being honoured in a special ceremony to mark Black History Month . Paul Stephenson , who led a boycott in
